languages.text: {n}Обезумевший от горя, мужчина достает ржавый, еле заточенный кусок трубы, и умоляюще протягивает вам.{/n} "Я... н-не смогу. Не хватит ни силы, ни пальцев. А вы благословенны Им, правителем всех звезд в мире. Вы — сможете".

traits.locale_text: {n}Обезумивший от горя, мужчина достает ржавый, еле заточенный кусок трубы, и умоляюще протягивает вам.{/n} "Я... н-не смогу. Не хватит ни силы, ни пальцев. А вы благословенны Им, правителем всех звезд в мире. Вы — сможете".

languages.text: {n}Frantic with grief, the man pulls out a barely sharpened piece of rusty pipe and pleadingly offers it to you.{/n} "I... c-cannot do it. I do not have either the strength or the fingers. But you are blessed by Him, the sovereign of all the stars in the sky. So you can do it for me."
languages.original_text: {n}Обезумевший от горя, мужчина достает ржавый, еле заточенный кусок трубы, и умоляюще протягивает вам.{/n} "Я... н-не смогу. Не хватит ни силы, ни пальцев. А вы благословенны Им, правителем всех звезд в мире. Вы — сможете".

traits.locale_text: {n}Frantic with grief, the man pulls out a barely sharpened piece of rusty pipe and pleadingly offers it to you.{/n} "I... c-cannot do it. I do not have either the strength or the fingers. But you are blessed by the Exalted One, the sovereign of all the stars in the sky. So you can do it for me."

{n}Frantic with grief, the man pulls out a barely sharpened piece of rusty pipe and pleadingly offers it to you.{/n} "I... c-cannot do it. I do not have either the strength or the fingers. But you are blessed by the Exalted One, the sovereign of all the stars in the sky. So you can do it for me."

{n}Frantic with grief, the man pulls out a barely sharpened piece of rusty pipe and pleadingly offers it to you.{/n} "I... c-cannot do it. I do not have either the strength or the fingers. But you are blessed by Him, the sovereign of all the stars in the sky. So you can do it for me."

{n}Frantic with grief, the man pulls out a barely sharpened piece of rusty pipe and pleadingly offers it to you.{/n} "I... c-cannot do it. I do not have either the strength or the fingers. But you are blessed by Him, the sovereign of all the stars in the sky. So you can do it for me."

{n}Frantic with grief, the man pulls out a barely sharpened piece of rusty pipe and pleadingly offers it to you.{/n} "I... c-cannot do it. I do not have either the strength or the fingers. But you are blessed by Him, the sovereign of all the stars in the sky. So you can do it for me."

languages.text: {n}男は嘆きの中、鈍く錆びついたパイプを取り出し、あなたに嘆願するように差し出した。{/n}「私…私にはできません。そんな力も、そんな心も。しかし、あなたはあのお方に祝福されています、空のすべての星々の主に。だから、あなたが代わりにお願いします」
languages.original_text: {n}Frantic with grief, the man pulls out a barely sharpened piece of rusty pipe and pleadingly offers it to you.{/n} "I... c-cannot do it. I do not have either the strength or the fingers. But you are blessed by Him, the sovereign of all the stars in the sky. So you can do it for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は嘆きの中、鈍く錆びついたパイプを取り出し、あなたに嘆願するように差し出した。{/n}「私…私にはできません。そんな力も、そんな心も。しかし、あなたはあのお方に祝福されています、空のすべての星々の主に。だから、あなたが代わりにお願いします」

languages.text: {n}Complètement éperdu, l'homme vous tend un vieux tuyau rouillé vaguement affûté.{/n} « Je... je ne peux pas faire ça. Je n'ai plus assez de force... ou de doigts. Mais vous, vous avez reçu la bénédiction du souverain de toutes les étoiles. Faites-le pour moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Frantic with grief, the man pulls out a barely sharpened piece of rusty pipe and pleadingly offers it to you.{/n} "I... c-cannot do it. I do not have either the strength or the fingers. But you are blessed by Him, the sovereign of all the stars in the sky. So you can do it for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Complètement éperdu, l'homme vous tend un vieux tuyau rouillé vaguement affûté.{/n} « Je... je ne peux pas faire ça. Je n'ai plus assez de force... ou de doigts. Mais vous, vous avez reçu la bénédiction du souverain de toutes les étoiles. Faites-le pour moi. »

languages.text: {n}他悲痛欲绝，掏出一根勉强磨尖的生锈铁管，恳求般地递给你。{/n}“我……做不到。我没有力气，也没有手指。可你……你得到了神皇的祝福，天上所有的星星都在看着你，所以你肯定能帮我。”
languages.original_text: {n}Frantic with grief, the man pulls out a barely sharpened piece of rusty pipe and pleadingly offers it to you.{/n} "I... c-cannot do it. I do not have either the strength or the fingers. But you are blessed by Him, the sovereign of all the stars in the sky. So you can do it for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}他悲痛欲绝，掏出一根勉强磨尖的生锈铁管，恳求般地递给你。{/n}“我……做不到。我没有力气，也没有手指。可你……你得到了神皇的祝福，天上所有的星星都在看着你，所以你肯定能帮我。”

languages.text: {n}El hombre, preso del frenesí del momento, saca un trozo apenas afilado de tubería oxidada y te lo ofrece suplicante.{/n} «Yo... no puedo hacerlo. No tengo ni la fuerza ni los dedos. Mas usted tiene Su bendición, la del soberano de todas las estrellas del firmamento. Puede hacerlo por mí».
languages.original_text: {n}Frantic with grief, the man pulls out a barely sharpened piece of rusty pipe and pleadingly offers it to you.{/n} "I... c-cannot do it. I do not have either the strength or the fingers. But you are blessed by Him, the sovereign of all the stars in the sky. So you can do it for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre, preso del frenesí del momento, saca un trozo apenas afilado de tubería oxidada y te lo ofrece suplicante.{/n} «Yo... no puedo hacerlo. No tengo ni la fuerza ni los dedos. Mas usted tiene Su bendición, la del soberano de todas las estrellas del firmamento. Puede hacerlo por mí».

languages.text: {n}Panisch vor Trauer zieht der Mann ein nahezu völlig stumpfes rostiges Rohr heraus und hält es dir flehentlich entgegen.{/n} "Ich ... k-kann es nicht tun. Ich habe weder die Kraft noch die Finger. Aber Ihr seid von ihm gesegnet, vom Herrscher über alle Sterne am Himmel. Ihr könnt es für mich tun."
languages.original_text: {n}Frantic with grief, the man pulls out a barely sharpened piece of rusty pipe and pleadingly offers it to you.{/n} "I... c-cannot do it. I do not have either the strength or the fingers. But you are blessed by Him, the sovereign of all the stars in the sky. So you can do it for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Panisch vor Trauer zieht der Mann ein nahezu völlig stumpfes rostiges Rohr heraus und hält es dir flehentlich entgegen.{/n} "Ich ... k-kann es nicht tun. Ich habe weder die Kraft noch die Finger. Aber Ihr seid von ihm gesegnet, vom Herrscher über alle Sterne am Himmel. Ihr könnt es für mich tun."

languages.text: {n}Kederden kendini kaybeden adam, keskin denmeyecek bir paslı boru parçası çıkarıp yalvarır bir ifadeyle sana uzatıyor.{/n} "Ben... Ben yapamam. Ne gücüm ne de parmaklarım var. Ama siz, göklerdeki yıldızların efendisi olan O'nun tarafından kutsanmışsınız. Benim yerime yapabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Frantic with grief, the man pulls out a barely sharpened piece of rusty pipe and pleadingly offers it to you.{/n} "I... c-cannot do it. I do not have either the strength or the fingers. But you are blessed by Him, the sovereign of all the stars in the sky. So you can do it for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kederden kendini kaybeden adam keskin denmeyecek bir paslı boru parçası çıkarıp yalvarır bir ifadeyle sana uzatıyor.{/n} "Ben... Ben yapamam. Ne gücüm ne de parmaklarım var. Ama siz, göklerdeki yıldızların efendisi olan O'nun tarafından kutsanmışsınız. Benim için bunu siz yapabilirsiniz."
